Interface Http.Request

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Http.RequestHeader
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public static interface Http.Request
extends Http.RequestHeader
    An HTTP request.

      • body

      • username

        The user name for this request, if defined. This is usually set by annotating your Action with @Authenticated.
